list.name: requirement_table
list.comment: Must be in castle age and not have already built this wonder.

template_reference.name: help_text_formatter
template_reference.comment: Remember to update the sbps help text for the packed/cart version.

list.name: formatter_arguments
list.comment: Remember to update the sbps help text for the packed/cart version.

float.name: ui_range_radius
float.comment: 10 is the setting for deep strike radius, if this number need to be changed, then deep strike radius needs to request programming support

template_reference.name: exts
template_reference.comment: Make sure the building and moving building are referencing the same schema, if they are using different schemas unpacking will break.
